column4: I've just try'd to upgrade from hardy to kermic (not a good idea), the problem I'm facing is proc not mounting (device busy..) error, and suggestions about changeing sertain things in grub/menu.lst, none of the suggestions have worked so far, this is on a apple tv 1gen, it also won't boot the newer kernel that kermic upgraded to.
I'd be happy just to get it up and running again eather by downgrading if it's possible, or fixing the proc error
